message:
Thanks.

I got it to work.

Finally loaded geodata from github. It was not on Cran, only geoData. Once I got it loaded, I realized that geodata provided all the data with the elevation_30s function. I just had to create a storage area in my Project file.

Jim
message_html:
Thanks.

I got it to work.

Finally loaded geodata from github. It was not on Cran, only geoData. Once I got it loaded, I realized that geodata provided all the data with the elevation_30s function. I just had to create a storage area in my Project file.

Jim
